attributes.action: Assisting Existing Mortgagees & First Time Buyers
attributes.additional_details:
Change is required and I hope by supporting my cause we will make lenders offer a better solution to home owners and at the same time reducing risk when owning your own home.

How does it work?
1. Offering fixed Life time mortgages

2. Affordability, Protection of assets and realistic borrowing rates.

3. Regulating how we improve our homes and minimising risk to home owners.

4. Using the current government schemes to help First Time Buyers

A full synopsis can be found on - http://www.lovemyidea.com/ViewIdea.aspx?IdeaID=644
